channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Boats return to the Potomac River for DC plane crash recovery and investigation
item.description: Police boats have returned to the Potomac River as part of the recovery and investigation after the United States’ deadliest aviation disaster in almost a quarter century.

item.title: What to know about the NTSB and the investigation into the DC plane crash
Crews in midair crash included second-generation pilot and flight attendant ‘full of life’
